translation: Sutra of the Dhāraṇī of the Kuśinagara

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試光祿卿
translation: Tripiṭaka of the Western Translation of the Sutra, Chaozan Dashi, and Guangluqing

source_sentence: 明教大師臣法賢奉　詔譯
translation: Mingjiao dashi ministers, Faxian, in accordance with the imperial edict, translated
Thus I have heard.

source_sentence: 一時佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.
He was with a large assembly of monks.

source_sentence: 復有天人阿修羅乾闥婆等俱來會坐。
translation: There were also gods, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and others who came together to sit there.
It was then that the Buddha addressed Venerable Ānanda, saying.

source_sentence: 汝當諦聽我有陀羅尼名俱枳羅。
translation: "Listen closely! I have a dhāraṇī named Kukila.
It has great authority and is capable of producing good fortune.

source_sentence: 能破部多及惡曜等之所執持。
translation: It can disrupt the hold of ministers, bad yakṣas, and so forth.
It's also able to remove and cure all illnesses.
They are called food sickness, cold and heat sickness.
Headaches and half-aches, itching, and wheezing.
It goes so far as to treat hemorrhoids and white sores.
and various kinds of sores and wounds.

source_sentence: 阿難至於眾生命欲斷者亦能延續。
translation: Ānanda, even those whose desire for life is cut off can continue.
I therefore will now explain it for you.

source_sentence: 阿難若復有人聞此陀羅尼。
translation: "Ānanda, suppose another person hears this dhāraṇī.
He recites it with a resolute mind and memorizes and upholds it.

source_sentence: 是人所獲善利無量無邊。
translation: The good benefits that person receives are measureless and limitless.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊即說陀羅尼曰。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke the dhāraṇī, saying.

source_sentence: 怛[寧*也](切身下同)他(引一)唵(引)壹里蜜里(二)唧里彌(引三)嚩囉酤(引)計隷(引)室哩(二合)末底(四)崑拏隷(引五)農訥毘(六)農訥毘(七)印捺囉(二合)嚩日囉(二合引)儗儞(二合)暮哩儞(二合八)薩哩嚩(二合)嚩日囉(二合引)儗儞(二合)暮哩儞(二合九)沒囉(二合)賀摩(二合)莎哩(二合)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引十)野他(引)杌嚕(二合引)沒馱(十一)薩埵(引)曩(引)尾囉(引)誐室哩(二合引)瑟吒(二合十二)薩哩嚩(二合)達哩摩(二合引)赧(引十三)誐拏鉢囉(二合)嚩囉(十四)商伽薩爹嚩(引)計曳(二合引)那(十五)遏儞(引)那薩爹嚩計曳(二合引)那(十六)摩摩薩哩嚩(二合)薩埵(引)曩(引十七)遏悉當(十八)閉當(十九)珂儞當(二十)阿(引)莎(引)儞多(引)儞(二十一)三藐酤(半音)窣契(引)那(二十二)波哩拏(引)莽誐蹉覩娑嚩(二合引)賀(引二十三)爾時世尊說此陀羅尼已。
translation: "After the Bhagavān taught this dhāraṇī, he said.
He told Ānanda.
"This is where the dhāraṇī is located.

source_sentence: 我不見有天上人間一切梵魔沙門婆羅門等敢有違越。
translation: I don't see any Brahmā, Māra, ascetics, priests, or other beings up in heaven or among humans who would dare to transgress it.
You must accept it and teach it to others.
That way, many people will receive great benefit.'

source_sentence: 阿難及與會中天人阿修羅乾闥婆等。
translation: Ānanda and the gods, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and others in the assembly rejoiced and believed what the Buddha taught.

source_sentence: 聞佛所說歡喜信受作禮而退。
translation: They rejoiced and believed what the Buddha taught, paid homage, and withdrew.
Dhāraṇī of the Kuśinagara Sutra Spoken by the Buddha
